General.Name: Neuroone Medical Technologies Corp
General.Description: NeuroOne Medical Technologies Corporation, a medical technology company, provides solutions for continuous electroencephalogram (cEEG) and stereoelectrocencephalography (sEEG) recording in the United States. The company also provides solutions for spinal cord stimulation, radio frequency and brain stimulation, drug delivery and ablation solutions for patients suffering from epilepsy, Parkinson's disease, dystonia, essential tremors, and chronic pain due to failed back surgeries and other pain-related neurological disorders. The company also focuses on applications of its technology associated with artificial intelligence. It has partnership with RBC Medical Innovations to develop a radio frequency ablation generator. NeuroOne Medical Technologies Corporation is based in Eden Prairie, Minnesota.
General.Address: 7599 Anagram Drive, Eden Prairie, MN, United States, 55344
